* Iron Raptor watches as Angel Prime and his small group of followers are 
fired upon by the Alliance, watching with cold eyes as charges head towards 
the Maximals which had chosen to ignore her.
In one pert of her mind she thought that it served them right, they would 
have been safe if they had listened. Thinking that maybe they would learn a 
lesson by this, if they lived through it.
But Iron Raptor knew something that some of the bots already did or might 
not know.
If they stayed here only a small amout of their forces would be mowed down, 
but if they fought too then the Alliance would fire back and the war would 
be on again.
Chordate, she knew, wasn't going to be saved. But the Maximals being fired 
upon had the chance to be. Plus...the captives in the ship could be used to 
ease the force of the battle and maybe think twice.
But the captive idea wasn't going to be used.
Iron Raptor looked at Prowl as ke spoke, then looking at the remainder of 
the Maximals behind her.
There were all edgy and itchy to fight, ready to come to the defence of 
their comrads. And even though Angel Prime was the last person she wanted to 
save right there and then, she couln't leave the Maximals out there either.
She sighed and nodded.*

" We'll help him."

* Iron Raptor then looked at the rest of the Maximals, still not sure if 
what she was doing was right. She could be sending a lot of Maximals to 
their deaths by doing this. But since when did Maximals leave comrads 
without a hope?*

" We're moving out. Charge yourselves and pick someone to join with you on 
the field. No point in getting picked off once we're out there. Goota have 
someone watching your back."

* She took the sword and slashed the blade out towards the battle.*

" They're out there slaughtering our own kind! I don't know about all of you 
but I'm not about to let them get away with it!"

* Her expression became hard.*

" Firing in pairs will increase our chance to defeat them. Picking them off 
one by one, one pair putting all of their firepower into one bot until it 
either backs off or falls. Then moving onto the next. It might take a while 
but if we work together it'll pay off. The gustalt bots are our first 
targets, especially the ones which make up the legs. Without legs they can't 
move."

* Iron Raptor looked over the Maximals.*

" Now how many of you want to go out there and show those slags what defeat 
feels like?!"

* She then turned back towards the battle and took a step towards it.*

" Let's go!"
